name: Reflection Upon the Past Jam Submission
name_original: Reflection Upon the Past Jam Submission
description:
My first game jam, I misunderstood the theme format so I built this game in roughly 3 hours(minus planning, assets, and playtesting and building) with the theme "Reflections Upon the Past".  The idea of the game is to hit "Skill shots" off the mirror onto the trees to restore them all to life. The bouncing mechanic is not perfect and I couldn't get it to the level I would like but I hope you enjoy regardless. I would love to hear your feedback, or if you have any ideas about the bouncing issue. Thanks :)

Controls: basic fps controls

wasd: movement

left mouse click: fire projectile

Issue: Despite my best attempt to have a working HTML5 build there seem to be issues with the mouse controls and fullscreen settings. Therefore it's best to use the windows build.

Assets used are:
